211b6(nyi khri): ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs
211b7(nyi khri): su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su
212a1(nyi khri): dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor nam mkha'
212a2(nyi khri): la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
212a3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/
212a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar/ nam
212a5(nyi khri): mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod
212a6(nyi khri): du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes
212a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/
212b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /
212b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba
212b3(nyi khri): ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin
212b4(nyi khri): du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul
212b5(nyi khri): bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi
212b6(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bde ba mi spongs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang
212b7(nyi khri): bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang / tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab
213a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/
213a2(nyi khri): gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol du
213a3(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang po dang / tshad med pa grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar
213a4(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang /
213a5(nyi khri): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i
213a6(nyi khri): ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin
213a7(nyi khri): pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas
213b1(nyi khri): par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma
213b2(nyi khri): dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung
213b3(nyi khri): dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che ba dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/
213b4(nyi khri): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /
213b5(nyi khri): rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/ /sbyin
213b6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos
213b7(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
214a1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
214a2(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad
214a3(nyi khri): rgya cher bstan te/ de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang /
214a4(nyi khri): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang chung dge dang
214a5(nyi khri): tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang che ba dang / chung che dang tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha'
214a6(nyi khri): yas skye mched dang / med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs
214a7(nyi khri): rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /de bas na de ni pha rol du phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa rin po che de la ni
214b1(nyi khri): chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/
214b2(nyi khri): dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am zag pa med pa'am/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs
214b3(nyi khri): su med de rab 'byor rnam grangs nges kyang pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che la ni gang gis kyang 'go ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de'i
214b4(nyi khri): phyir na pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'o/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/
214b5(nyi khri): de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa'o/ /de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing /
214b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod
214b7(nyi khri): par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa'am/ rnam par ston pa'am/ yongs su ston pa'am/ 'dzin par byed pa'am/ 'byin par byed pa'am/ skye bar byed pa'am/
215a1(nyi khri): 'gag par byed pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa'am/ 'grib par byed pa'am/ 'phel bar byed pa'am/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bar byed pa med do/ /rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha
215a2(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i
215a3(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ nang
215a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad
215a5(nyi khri): med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa
215a6(nyi khri): ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
215a7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rang
215b1(nyi khri): byang chub sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa/
215b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos
215b3(nyi khri): kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par thugs su chud do/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas
215b4(nyi khri): kyang gsung ngo / /ston to/ /rjod do/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mud
215b5(nyi khri): dang / pund ri ka dang / mAn dA ra ba dang / mAn dA ra ba chen po 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi
215b6(nyi khri): 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin no/ /
215b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang chos gang yang 'khor ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du/
216a1(nyi khri): nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin
216a2(nyi khri): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
216a3(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
216a4(nyi khri): lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya dpas stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
216a5(nyi khri): thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo
216a6(nyi khri): rnams kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /
216a7(nyi khri): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo / /
216b1(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chen mo ste/
216b2(nyi khri): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
216b3(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang / chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang 'khor ba'am mi 'khor ba'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su
216b4(nyi khri): mthong ba'am yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin du mngon par ma grub
216b5(nyi khri): pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am mi 'khor bar
216b6(nyi khri): bgyid pa ma lags so/ /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang rab tu dgod pa dang gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyi ba dang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni
216b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ngo / /gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ /gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de
217a1(nyi khri): la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa
217a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
217a3(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
217a4(nyi khri): rnam par dben pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni thub pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
217a5(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang
217a6(nyi khri): lus med pa'i phyir ro/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
217a7(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
217b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
217b2(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /
217b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
217b4(nyi khri): cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
217b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
217b6(nyi khri): ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom
217b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad
218a1(nyi khri): 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
218a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang / sgrar brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
218a3(nyi khri): mig yor gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me long gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
218a4(nyi khri): chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
218a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis
218a6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
218a7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
218b1(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
218b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
218b3(nyi khri): pa 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom
218b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom
218b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan
218b6(nyi khri): ma med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
218b7(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
219a1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
219a2(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
219a3(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /
219a4(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
219a5(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /
219a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
219a7(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad
219b1(nyi khri): kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
219b2(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi
219b3(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tshol bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
219b4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
219b5(nyi khri): cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /
219b6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
219b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha
220a1(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
220a2(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs
220a3(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
220a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
220a5(nyi khri): pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
220a6(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /
220a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
220b1(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus
220b2(nyi khri): ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
220b3(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
220b4(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
220b5(nyi khri): du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
220b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol
220b7(nyi khri): du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol du
221a1(nyi khri): phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /
221a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu
221a3(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
221a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
221a5(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom
221a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
221a7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i
221b1(nyi khri): rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ smon pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
221b2(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
221b3(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
221b4(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang / ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
221b5(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang bzod pa
221b6(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang brtson 'grus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
221b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan dang 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
222a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab dang 'chal ba'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
222a2(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /
222a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
222a4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom
222a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom
222a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la
222a7(nyi khri): dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad tu mngon par rdzogs par
222b1(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du
222b2(nyi khri): grag pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de
222b3(nyi khri): dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ /gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du shes rab
222b4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
222b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so/ /yongs su zhus so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur la 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /
222b6(nyi khri): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
222b7(nyi khri): ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog
223a1(nyi khri): cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni
223a2(nyi khri): zab pa ste/ sngon pha rol du phyin pa drug la ma spyad pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mos par bgyi bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems
223a3(nyi khri): pa dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i
223a4(nyi khri): slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la
223a5(nyi khri): ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid ni ji
223a6(nyi khri): ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
223a7(nyi khri): kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
223b1(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs
223b2(nyi khri): pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus/ yongs su ma dris so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
223b3(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shin du zab na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo
223b4(nyi khri): mtshar kyang ci che/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi
223b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
223b6(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
223b7(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i
224a1(nyi khri): bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin
224a2(nyi khri): no/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam
224a3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brjod do/ /kau shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
224a4(nyi khri): nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /
224a5(nyi khri): sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
224a6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
224a7(nyi khri): brtson par bya'o/ /khams gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
224b1(nyi khri): pa la brtson par bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
224b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
224b3(nyi khri): du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
224b4(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
224b5(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
224b6(nyi khri): dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na
224b7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de ltar
225a1(nyi khri): khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byung ngo / /kau shi ka 'di la byang chub
225a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi gnas te/ /gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang
225a3(nyi khri): gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /mig la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mig la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid la mi
225a4(nyi khri): gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ chos la
225a5(nyi khri): brtson par byed pa yin no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la
225a6(nyi khri): mi gnas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi
225a7(nyi khri): tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i
225b1(nyi khri): tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /ma rig pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor
225b2(nyi khri): ba dang / sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha
225b3(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi
225b4(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
225b5(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
225b6(nyi khri): la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
225b7(nyi khri): lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams
226a1(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rnam par thar pa
226a2(nyi khri): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson
226a3(nyi khri): par byed pa yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
226a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs
226a5(nyi khri): pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rang byang chub la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /lam gyi rnam pa
226a6(nyi khri): shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang /
226a7(nyi khri): gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i skye
226b1(nyi khri): mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs so/ /gang la gnas
226b2(nyi khri): par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
226b3(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
226b4(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom
226b5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la
226b6(nyi khri): mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i
226b7(nyi khri): tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la brtson par byed pa
227a1(nyi khri): yin no/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
227a2(nyi khri): chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
227a3(nyi khri): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams
227a4(nyi khri): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
227a5(nyi khri): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /
227a6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
227a7(nyi khri): po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam par
227b1(nyi khri): shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dbus su mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dbus su
227b2(nyi khri): mi dmigs so/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
227b3(nyi khri): rtsa bdun dbus su mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong
227b4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
227b5(nyi khri): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen
227b6(nyi khri): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa
227b7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
228a1(nyi khri): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /
228a2(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
228a3(nyi khri): phyin pa zab bo/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang
228a4(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo
228a5(nyi khri): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir
228a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gting dpag dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
228a7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag
228b1(nyi khri): dka'o/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gting dpag
228b2(nyi khri): dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
228b3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
228b4(nyi khri): gting dpag dka'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /rnam
228b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa
228b6(nyi khri): ti'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched dang
228b7(nyi khri): khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad
229a1(nyi khri): med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
229a2(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
229a3(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad
229a4(nyi khri): med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
229a5(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /
229a6(nyi khri): skye mched dang / khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob ces bya bar mi spyod na/
229a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
229b1(nyi khri): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
229b2(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad
229b3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga ba/ bam po bzhi bcu gnyis pa/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi zab pa
229b4(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/
229b5(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ma yin no/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ma yin no/ /'phags
229b6(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
229b7(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi
230a1(nyi khri): sgo rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
230a2(nyi khri): pa brgyad ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal
230a3(nyi khri): te gzugs gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /skye mched dang
230a4(nyi khri): khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gting dpag dka'o zhes
230a5(nyi khri): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
230a6(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpa' dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin
230a7(nyi khri): rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnam gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
230b1(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi sbyor na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir
230b2(nyi khri): zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rnam
230b3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
230b4(nyi khri): gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /skye mched dang khams dang
230b5(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/
230b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
230b7(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams
231a1(nyi khri): tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad
231a2(nyi khri): tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi tshad
231a3(nyi khri): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam
231a4(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de ltar zab po/ /de ltar gting dpag dka'o/ /de ltar rtogs par dka'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab
231a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'jigs
231a6(nyi khri): sngang shing skrag par 'gyur du mchi'o/ /the tshom dang nem nur 'tshal du mchi'o/ /mos pa ma mchis par 'gyur du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo
231a7(nyi khri): 'di bstan par bgyi ste/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ the tshom dang nem nur 'tshal bar mi 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang gong nas gong du mos pa dang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang
231b1(nyi khri): klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dpang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
231b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab
231b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'jigs par 'gyur/ sngang bar 'gyur/ skrag par 'gyur te/ phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ /sbod bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni mos par yang mi 'gyur te/
231b4(nyi khri): kau shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos nas/ spangs pa'i phyir de log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed cing sogs par 'gyur te/ las byas pa
231b5(nyi khri): dang bsags pa des kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
231b6(nyi khri): chen po lung ma bstan pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos
231b7(nyi khri): nas mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam/
232a1(nyi khri): gnyis las mi 'da' bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ sha ra
232a2(nyi khri): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / ji ltar
232a3(nyi khri): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
232a4(nyi khri): de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
232a5(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i rmi lam na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / tshul
232a6(nyi khri): khrims bsrung ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba nas/ snying po byang chub la mchis pa'i bar du gyur na yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan
232a7(nyi khri): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyid kyis ma log pa zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / tshul khrims
232b1(nyi khri): bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa yongs su btang ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
