317b5(nyi khri): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba
317b6(nyi khri): ltag la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la
317b7(nyi khri): yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang
318a1(nyi khri): chub nyid kyang shin du mi dmigs na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te/ de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang
318a2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyang shin tu mi dmigs na de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
318a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du spyad par gyur pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de
318a4(nyi khri): dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u sum cu drug pa'o// //gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
318a5(nyi khri): gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi tshul dang / mtshan ma dang / rnam pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
318a6(nyi khri): pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod chags rnam par bsal bas/ dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
318a7(nyi khri): ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnam par bsal bas/ dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
318b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi tshul gyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
318b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems
318b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rnam pas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su 'tshal bar
318b4(nyi khri): 'gyur ba de dag gi ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ rnam pa thams cad
318b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can te/ sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
318b6(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can ni sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
318b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di 'tshal kyang / de la sems can dang sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
319a1(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o/ /
319a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin
319a3(nyi khri): zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang shin du med la/ byang
319a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang / 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang
319a5(nyi khri): 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor
319a6(nyi khri): go cha de ni bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin/ sems can dang 'brel pa ma yin/ srog dang 'brel pa ma yin/ skye ba dang 'brel pa ma yin/ gso ba dang 'brel pa ma yin/ skyes bu dang 'brel pa ma yin/ gang zag dang 'brel pa ma yin/
319a7(nyi khri): shed can dang 'brel pa ma yin/ shed bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin/ byed pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin/ tshor ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin/ shes pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin/ mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
319b1(nyi khri): mthong ba po yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha de yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa
319b2(nyi khri): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
319b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
319b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de
319b5(nyi khri): ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha de yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub
319b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med
319b7(nyi khri): pas/ de'i phyir go che de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran
320a1(nyi khri): pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de
320a2(nyi khri): ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang
320a3(nyi khri): shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
320a4(nyi khri): kyi bar dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab
320a5(nyi khri): ' byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma
320a6(nyi khri): yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs
320a7(nyi khri): par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/
320b1(nyi khri): de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/ sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis
320b2(nyi khri): don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par
320b3(nyi khri): mi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i
320b4(nyi khri): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad
320b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin te/
320b6(nyi khri): ye shes nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos
320b7(nyi khri): so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni shin du zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ ci yang bsgom par mi bgyi/ gang du yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
321a1(nyi khri): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa'am/ gang bsgom par bgyi ba'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
321a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom
321a3(nyi khri): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan
321a4(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par
321a5(nyi khri): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
321a6(nyi khri): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom
321a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong
321b1(nyi khri): pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
321b2(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
321b3(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
321b4(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po
321b5(nyi khri): dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams
321b6(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
321b7(nyi khri): rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
322a1(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom
322a2(nyi khri): pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang
322a3(nyi khri): byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de
322a4(nyi khri): bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
322a5(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor
322a6(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu
322a7(nyi khri): dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shes bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa thams
322b1(nyi khri): cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid thams cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang
322b2(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
322b3(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo
322b4(nyi khri): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
322b5(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /de nas yang
322b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rab 'byor
322b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
323a1(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson
323a2(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
323a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
323a4(nyi khri): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /'phags
323a5(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
323a6(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /
323a7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes
323b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems
323b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi blta
323b3(nyi khri): 'am phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi
323b4(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang / gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pa'i 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir mi ldog
323b5(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i
323b6(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ zhes
323b7(nyi khri): yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum pa dang / yongs su zhum par mi
324a1(nyi khri): 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dka' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/ de bzhin
324a2(nyi khri): nyid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang / gzung zhing bcangs te kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul
324a3(nyi khri): bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum par mi 'gyur
324a4(nyi khri): yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/ thos nas kyang ched du 'dzin cing 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
324a5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo
324a6(nyi khri): 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o/ /gsol
324a7(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
324b1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /
324b2(nyi khri): skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / yang
324b3(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la
324b4(nyi khri): rtog pa yin/ rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no//
324b5(nyi khri): // //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu dgu pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du
324b6(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin
324b7(nyi khri): nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan dang sgra brnyan dang smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/
325a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/
325a2(nyi khri): skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rtog pa lags sam/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
325a3(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
325a4(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams
325a5(nyi khri): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
325a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ /pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang
325a7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
325b1(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
325b2(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no/ /
325b3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang
325b4(nyi khri): du yang ma song / /phyogs na yang mi gnas/ yul na yang mi gnas gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so/ /'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang mi dmigs so/ /gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de la ni gang gis
325b5(nyi khri): kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas ma yin no/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas ma yin no/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas
325b6(nyi khri): ma yin no/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas ma yin no/ /nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ /
325b7(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
326a1(nyi khri): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshor ba nyid dang /
326a2(nyi khri): 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi
326a3(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
326a4(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ pha rol
326a5(nyi khri): du phyin pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
326a6(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
326a7(nyi khri): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
326b1(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
326b2(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u sum cu bdun pa'o// //de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha
326b3(nyi khri): rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / pad mo dang / ku mud dang / bun da ri ka mang po khyer te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to/ /gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
326b4(nyi khri): kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin
326b5(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor
326b6(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
326b7(nyi khri): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin
327a1(nyi khri): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
327a2(nyi khri): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
327a3(nyi khri): nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dag pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs
327a4(nyi khri): dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dad bsam gtan dang tshad med pa
327a5(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam
327a6(nyi khri): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po
327a7(nyi khri): dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
327b1(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
327b2(nyi khri): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
327b3(nyi khri): gnyis su byar med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
327b4(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
327b5(nyi khri): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dngos
327b6(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
327b7(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
328a1(nyi khri): lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags pa'i bden
328a2(nyi khri): pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam par
328a3(nyi khri): thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
328a4(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
328a5(nyi khri): ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs
328a6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes
328a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu ma mchis la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka'
328b1(nyi khri): ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
328b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel
328b3(nyi khri): bar 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
328b4(nyi khri): pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
328b5(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
328b6(nyi khri): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu
328b7(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'phags
329a1(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /rnam
329a2(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
329a3(nyi khri): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
329a4(nyi khri): pa'o/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
329a5(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
329a6(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
329a7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa
329b1(nyi khri): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
329b2(nyi khri): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
329b3(nyi khri): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
329b4(nyi khri): pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
329b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin
329b6(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par
329b7(nyi khri): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang /
330a1(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /
330a2(nyi khri): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
330a3(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ /lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir
330a4(nyi khri): zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu med la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba 'jig
330a5(nyi khri): rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/ /lha'i bu dag
330a6(nyi khri): nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag bsam
330a7(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mi skye mi 'gag pa dang / mngon par
330b1(nyi khri): rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang mngon par
330b2(nyi khri): rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /sems can dang srog dang 'gro ba dang gso ba dang / skyes bu dang gang zag dang shed can dang shed bdag dang byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes
330b3(nyi khri): pa po dang mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar
330b4(nyi khri): 'byung ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
330b5(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar
330b6(nyi khri): gzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag 'phags
330b7(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rnam par thar pa dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
331a1(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs
331a2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i
331a3(nyi khri): chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma
331a4(nyi khri): lags mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
331a5(nyi khri): chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
331a6(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
331a7(nyi khri): pa brgyad gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ chos zab mo 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir
331b1(nyi khri): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi
331b2(nyi khri): gzugs so/ /bdag ni gzugs can no/ /bdag ni tshor ba'o/ /bdag gis tshor bar bya'o/ /bdag gi 'du shes so/ /bdag ni 'du shes can no/ /bdag gi 'du byed do/ /bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bdag gis rnam par
331b3(nyi khri): shes par bya'o/ /bdag gi skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o/ /bdag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos can no/ /bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag
331b4(nyi khri): gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi
331b5(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
331b6(nyi khri): phyin pa'o/ /bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do/ /bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro/ /bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo
331b7(nyi khri): bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o/ /bdag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /bdag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
332a1(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
332a2(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo'o/ /bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi de bzhin
332a3(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i
332a4(nyi khri): 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag ni phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi dgra
332a5(nyi khri): bcom pa nyid do/ /bdag ni dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rang byang chub bo bdag ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'dzin
332a6(nyi khri): pa la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam
332a7(nyi khri): par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gzung pa'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad
332b1(nyi khri): dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa dang mthar gyis
332b2(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs
332b3(nyi khri): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma
332b4(nyi khri): yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin no/ /lha'i bu dag gang yang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang skye mched dang khams
332b5(nyi khri): dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /
332b6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gzung
332b7(nyi khri): ba'i phyir ram/ mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
333a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom
333a2(nyi khri): par mi nus so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so/ /nang stong pa nyid
333a3(nyi khri): bsgom par mi nus so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang dbang po rnams dang / stobs
333a4(nyi khri): rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la
333a5(nyi khri): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa ste chos 'di ni chos gang rnams dang rjes su 'thun pa lags she na/ chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni bsam
333a6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /
333a7(nyi khri): chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
333b1(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
333b2(nyi khri): dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
333b3(nyi khri): rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang rjes su 'thun pa'o/ /
333b4(nyi khri): chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ ci la thogs pa ma mchis she na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
333b5(nyi khri): ba la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i
333b6(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
333b7(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /rnam pa
334a1(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis so/ /chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings gnas pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
334a2(nyi khri): dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du
334a3(nyi khri): thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /chos 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang
334a4(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi sum cu rtsa bdun gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa
334a5(nyi khri): brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi
334a6(nyi khri): 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ /
334a7(nyi khri): chos 'di ni gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid
334b1(nyi khri): thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rten mi dmigs pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
334b2(nyi khri): dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang snying
334b3(nyi khri): rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du rten ma mchis pa'o/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan
334b4(nyi khri): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni ci dang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston to/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /
334b5(nyi khri): smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di
334b6(nyi khri): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /zhes zer ba ni ji ltar rjes su skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin zhe na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa ste/ ji ltar
334b7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song pas na/ thog ma nas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
335a1(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de'o/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin no/ /de ltar
335a2(nyi khri): na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur
335a3(nyi khri): ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ci la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ci la yang
335a4(nyi khri): thogs pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig cing gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med la de bzhin nyid de yang ma byas pa ste/ de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du
335a5(nyi khri): ma gyur pa yang med de de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa yang med pa de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
335a6(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa/
335a7(nyi khri): dbyer med pa 'byed pa ma yin pa dmigs su med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa/ 'byed pa ma yin pa dmigs su med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ ji
335b1(nyi khri): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin te/ de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin zhing rtag tu de bzhin nyid yin pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyang rnam pa gzhan ma yin par de bzhin gshegs
335b2(nyi khri): pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gar yang rjes su skyes pa med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes bya ste/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin
335b3(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /
335b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis
335b5(nyi khri): mnyam pa nyid kyis/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do/ /de ltar na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin
335b6(nyi khri): nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /
335b7(nyi khri): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
336a1(nyi khri): nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis
336a2(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /
336a3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod
336a4(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha
336a5(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin
336a6(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de de ltar na nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs
336a7(nyi khri): pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /
336b1(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin
336b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de

336b4(nyi khri): la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms

336b7(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar na

337a3(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong
337a4(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos sa rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos so/ /'gul to rab tu 'gul to kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go rab tu ldeg go kun tu ldeg go/ /chem chem rab tu chem chem kun tu chem chem mo/ /'ur
337a5(nyi khri): 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig rab tu shig shig kun tu shig shig go/ /shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/ shar phyogs dma' na ni nub phyogs mtho/ /byang phyogs mtho na ni lho phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs dma' na ni lho
337a6(nyi khri): phyogs mtho/ /dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma'/ dbus dma' na ni mtha' mtho bar gyur to/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas
337a7(nyi khri): gtor/ mngon par gtor rab tu gtor nas/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ngo mtshar to zhes tshig tu brjod do/ /de nas gnas brtan rab
337b1(nyi khri): 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /de ltar lha'i bu dag gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes

337b4(nyi khri): rjes su ma skyes/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /

337b7(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam pa thams
338a1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las
338a2(nyi khri): gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ /'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma
